Illustration & Design

I have a lot of fun with a pencil and paper. Sometimes I draw greeting cards, and sometimes I sketch ideas for mobile app and website layouts.

  • View Illustrations
  • Greeting Cards

    I have way too much fun drawing personified, overly-sentimental vegetables.

    Drawing greeting cards has been a great way to change gears away from engineering now and then.
